sn12.47:1.2: Atha kho janussoni brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.47:3.2: “‘Sabbam natthi’ti kho, brahmana, ayam dutiyo anto.
sn12.47:3.3: Ete te, brahmana, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.47:4.1: Evam vutte, janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
